SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view.GUI

Class GUIManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view.GUI.GUIManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConcreteContext, ViewManager
public class GUIManager extends Object implements ViewManager
The GUIManager is the class which make possible to display the information and to manage the inputs with JavaFX
